mn43:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn43:1.3: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
mn43:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
mn43:2.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, duppannoti vuccati”ti?
mn43:2.3: “‘Nappajanati nappajanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma duppannoti vuccati.
mn43:2.5: ‘Idam dukkhan’ti nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti nappajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti nappajanati.
mn43:2.6: ‘Nappajanati nappajanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma duppannoti vuccati”ti.
mn43:2.7: “Sadhavuso”ti kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva ayasmantam sariputtam uttarim panham apucchi:
mn43:3.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, pannavati vuccati”ti?
mn43:3.3: “‘Pajanati pajanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma pannavati vuccati.
mn43:3.5: ‘Idam dukkhan’ti pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti pajanati.
mn43:3.6: ‘Pajanati pajanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma pannavati vuccati”ti.
mn43:4.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, vinnananti vuccati”ti?
mn43:4.3: “‘Vijanati vijanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma vinnananti vuccati.
mn43:4.5: Sukhantipi vijanati, dukkhantipi vijanati, adukkhamasukhantipi vijanati.
mn43:4.6: ‘Vijanati vijanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma vinnananti vuccati”ti.
mn43:5.3: Labbha ca panimesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetun”ti?
mn43:5.6: Na ca labbha imesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetum.
mn43:5.7: Yam havuso, pajanati tam vijanati, yam vijanati tam pajanati.
mn43:5.8: Tasma ime dhamma samsattha, no visamsattha.
mn43:5.9: Na ca labbha imesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetun”ti.
mn43:6.2: imesam dhammanam samsatthanam no visamsatthanam kim nanakaranan”ti?
mn43:6.4: imesam dhammanam samsatthanam no visamsatthanam panna bhavetabba, vinnanam parinneyyam.
mn43:7.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, vedanati vuccati”ti?
mn43:7.3: “‘Vedeti vedeti’ti kho, avuso, tasma vedanati vuccati.
mn43:7.5: Sukhampi vedeti, dukkhampi vedeti, adukkhamasukhampi vedeti.
mn43:7.6: ‘Vedeti vedeti’ti kho, avuso, tasma vedanati vuccati”ti.
mn43:8.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, sannati vuccati”ti?
mn43:8.3: “‘Sanjanati sanjanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma sannati vuccati.
mn43:8.5: Nilakampi sanjanati, pitakampi sanjanati, lohitakampi sanjanati, odatampi sanjanati.
mn43:8.6: ‘Sanjanati sanjanati’ti kho, avuso, tasma sannati vuccati”ti.
mn43:9.1: “Ya cavuso, vedana ya ca sanna yanca vinnanam—
mn43:9.3: Labbha ca panimesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetun”ti?
mn43:9.4: “Ya cavuso, vedana ya ca sanna yanca vinnanam—
mn43:9.6: Na ca labbha imesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetum.
mn43:9.7: Yam havuso, vedeti tam sanjanati, yam sanjanati tam vijanati.
mn43:9.8: Tasma ime dhamma samsattha no visamsattha.
mn43:9.9: Na ca labbha imesam dhammanam vinibbhujitva vinibbhujitva nanakaranam pannapetun”ti.
mn43:10.1: “Nissatthena havuso, pancahi indriyehi parisuddhena manovinnanena kim neyyan”ti?
mn43:10.2: “Nissatthena, avuso, pancahi indriyehi parisuddhena manovinnanena ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam neyyam, ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam neyyam, ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam neyyan”ti.
mn43:13.3: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikaro.
mn43:13.4: Ime kho, avuso, dve paccaya sammaditthiya uppadaya”ti.
mn43:14.1: “Katihi panavuso, angehi anuggahita sammaditthi cetovimuttiphala ca hoti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca hoti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca”ti?
mn43:14.2: “Pancahi kho, avuso, angehi anuggahita sammaditthi cetovimuttiphala ca hoti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca hoti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca.
mn43:14.3: Idhavuso, sammaditthi silanuggahita ca hoti, sutanuggahita ca hoti, sakacchanuggahita ca hoti, samathanuggahita ca hoti, vipassananuggahita ca hoti.
mn43:14.4: Imehi kho, avuso, pancahangehi anuggahita sammaditthi cetovimuttiphala ca hoti cetovimuttiphalanisamsa ca, pannavimuttiphala ca hoti pannavimuttiphalanisamsa ca”ti.
mn43:18.2: “Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati—
mn43:19.3: Idhavuso, pathamam jhanam samapannassa bhikkhuno vitakko ca vattati, vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca.
mn43:19.4: Pathamam kho, avuso, jhanam evam pancangikan”ti.
mn43:20.3: Idhavuso, pathamam jhanam samapannassa bhikkhuno kamacchando pahino hoti, byapado pahino hoti, thinamiddham pahinam hoti, uddhaccakukkuccam pahinam hoti, vicikiccha pahina hoti;
mn43:20.4: vitakko ca vattati, vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca.
mn43:20.5: Pathamam kho, avuso, jhanam evam pancangavippahinam pancangasamannagatan”ti.
mn43:21.1: “Pancimani, avuso, indriyani nanavisayani nanagocarani, na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhonti, seyyathidam—
mn43:21.3: Imesam kho, avuso, pancannam indriyanam nanavisayanam nanagocaranam, na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhontanam, kim patisaranam, ko ca nesam gocaravisayam paccanubhoti”ti?
mn43:21.4: “Pancimani, avuso, indriyani nanavisayani nanagocarani, na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhonti, seyyathidam—
mn43:21.6: Imesam kho, avuso, pancannam indriyanam nanavisayanam nanagocaranam, na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhontanam, mano patisaranam, mano ca nesam gocaravisayam paccanubhoti”ti.
mn43:22.3: Imani kho, avuso, pancindriyani kim paticca titthanti”ti?
mn43:22.6: Imani kho, avuso, pancindriyani ayum paticca titthanti”ti.
mn43:22.11: “Idaneva kho mayam, avuso, ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam evam ajanama:
mn43:22.13: Idaneva pana mayam, avuso, ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam evam ajanama:
mn43:22.15: Yatha katham panavuso, imassa bhasitassa attho datthabbo”ti?
mn43:22.17: upamayapidhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
mn43:22.18: Seyyathapi, avuso, telappadipassa jhayato accim paticca abha pannayati, abham paticca acci pannayati;
mn43:22.19: evameva kho, avuso, ayu usmam paticca titthati, usma ayum paticca titthati”ti.
mn43:23.1: “Teva nu kho, avuso, ayusankhara, te vedaniya dhamma udahu anne ayusankhara anne vedaniya dhamma”ti?
mn43:23.2: “Na kho, avuso, teva ayusankhara te vedaniya dhamma.
mn43:23.3: Te ca havuso, ayusankhara abhavimsu te vedaniya dhamma, na yidam sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa bhikkhuno vutthanam pannayetha.
mn43:23.4: Yasma ca kho, avuso, anne ayusankhara anne vedaniya dhamma, tasma sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa bhikkhuno vutthanam pannayati”ti.
mn43:24.1: “Yada nu kho, avuso, imam kayam kati dhamma jahanti; athayam kayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yatha kattham acetanan”ti?
mn43:24.2: “Yada kho, avuso, imam kayam tayo dhamma jahanti—ayu usma ca vinnanam; athayam kayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yatha kattham acetanan”ti.
mn43:25.1: “Yvayam, avuso, mato kalankato, yo cayam bhikkhu sannavedayitanirodham samapanno—imesam kim nanakaranan”ti?
mn43:25.2: “Yvayam, avuso, mato kalankato tassa kayasankhara niruddha patippassaddha, vacisankhara niruddha patippassaddha, cittasankhara niruddha patippassaddha, ayu parikkhino, usma vupasanta, indriyani paribhinnani.
mn43:25.3: Yo cayam bhikkhu sannavedayitanirodham samapanno tassapi kayasankhara niruddha patippassaddha, vacisankhara niruddha patippassaddha, cittasankhara niruddha patippassaddha, ayu na parikkhino, usma avupasanta, indriyani vippasannani.
mn43:25.4: Yvayam, avuso, mato kalankato, yo cayam bhikkhu sannavedayitanirodham samapanno—idam nesam nanakaranan”ti.
mn43:26.2: “Cattaro kho, avuso, paccaya adukkhamasukhaya cetovimuttiya samapattiya.
mn43:26.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn43:26.4: Ime kho, avuso, cattaro paccaya adukkhamasukhaya cetovimuttiya samapattiya”ti.
mn43:27.2: “Dve kho, avuso, paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya samapattiya—
mn43:27.3: sabbanimittananca amanasikaro, animittaya ca dhatuya manasikaro.
mn43:27.4: Ime kho, avuso, dve paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya samapattiya”ti.
mn43:28.1: “Tayo kho, avuso, paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya thitiya—
mn43:28.2: sabbanimittananca amanasikaro, animittaya ca dhatuya manasikaro, pubbe ca abhisankharo.
mn43:28.3: Ime kho, avuso, tayo paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya thitiya”ti.
mn43:29.2: “Dve kho, avuso, paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya vutthanaya—
mn43:29.3: sabbanimittananca manasikaro, animittaya ca dhatuya amanasikaro.
mn43:29.4: Ime kho, avuso, dve paccaya animittaya cetovimuttiya vutthanaya”ti.
mn43:29.5: “Ya cayam, avuso, appamana cetovimutti, ya ca akincanna cetovimutti, ya ca sunnata cetovimutti, ya ca animitta cetovimutti—ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
mn43:30.1: “Ya cayam, avuso, appamana cetovimutti, ya ca akincanna cetovimutti, ya ca sunnata cetovimutti, ya ca animitta cetovimutti—atthi kho, avuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca;
mn43:30.2: atthi ca kho, avuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
mn43:31.1: Katamo cavuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca?
mn43:31.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharati.
mn43:31.5: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharati.
mn43:32.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn43:33.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
mn43:34.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
mn43:34.4: Ayam kho, avuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
mn43:35.1: Katamo cavuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanam?
mn43:35.2: Rago kho, avuso, pamanakarano, doso pamanakarano, moho pamanakarano.
mn43:35.3: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
mn43:35.4: Yavata kho, avuso, appamana cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
mn43:35.5: Sa kho panakuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
mn43:36.1: Rago kho, avuso, kincano, doso kincano, moho kincano.
mn43:36.2: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
mn43:36.3: Yavata kho, avuso, akincanna cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
mn43:36.4: Sa kho panakuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
mn43:37.1: Rago kho, avuso, nimittakarano, doso nimittakarano, moho nimittakarano.
mn43:37.2: Te khinasavassa bhikkhuno pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
mn43:37.3: Yavata kho, avuso, animitta cetovimuttiyo, akuppa tasam cetovimutti aggamakkhayati.
mn43:37.4: Sa kho panakuppa cetovimutti sunna ragena, sunna dosena, sunna mohena.
mn43:37.5: Ayam kho, avuso, pariyayo yam pariyayam agamma ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
mn43:37.7: Attamano ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinanditi.
